name: TrouveMoiUnPro inc.
description: Provider of a resource platform designed to change the way homeowners look for contractors. The company's resource platform helps to describe renovation project in one place, then receive within 24 hours, completely free of charge, several contractors who are best qualified and available to quote and execute the project, enabling users to get qualified potential clients based on their expertise and criteria, saving them on marketing efforts and spent.
one_liner: Provider of a resource platform designed to change the way homeowners look for contractors. The company's resource platform helps to describe renovation project in one place, then receive within 24 hours, completely free of charge, several contractors who are best qualified and available to quote and execute the project, enabling users to get qualified potential clients based on their expertise and criteria, saving them on marketing efforts and spent.
